Actions.Name: Create a Goal
Actions.Description: Creates a new Goal within an instance.

Actions.Name: Create a Risk
Actions.Description: Creates a new Risk on an existing Cascade Goal.

Actions.Name: Create a Task
Actions.Description: Creates a new Task on an existing Cascade Goal.

Actions.Name: Create an Update
Actions.Description: Creates a new Update on an existing Cascade Goal.

Actions.Name: Delete Goal
Actions.Description: Deletes a Goal based off of its Goal ID.

Actions.Name: Delete Risk
Actions.Description: Deletes a Risk based off of its Risk ID.

Actions.Name: Delete Task
Actions.Description: Deletes a Task based off of its Task ID.

Actions.Name: Delete Update
Actions.Description: Deletes an Update based off of its Update ID.

Actions.Name: Get all Goals
Actions.Description: Returns all Goals within an instance.

Actions.Name: Get all Risks
Actions.Description: Returns all Risks within an instance.

Actions.Name: Get all Tasks
Actions.Description: Returns all Tasks within an instance.

Actions.Name: Get all Updates
Actions.Description: Returns all Updates within an instance.

Actions.Name: Get single Goal
Actions.Description: Returns a single Goal based off of its Goal ID.

Actions.Name: Get single Risk
Actions.Description: Returns a single Risk based off of its Risk ID.

Actions.Name: Get single Task
Actions.Description: Returns a single Task based off of its Task ID.

Actions.Name: Get single Update
Actions.Description: Returns a single Update based off of its Update ID.

Actions.Name: Update a Goal
Actions.Description: Updates an existing Goal's details based off of its Goal ID.

Actions.Name: Update Risk
Actions.Description: Updates an existing Risk's details based off of its Risk ID.

Actions.Name: Update Task
Actions.Description: Updates an existing Task's details based off of its Task ID.

Actions.Name: Update an Update
Actions.Description: Revises an existing Update's details based off of its Update ID.
